I have only 2 reasons why i bought this game..
1.Good old times..
2.Bhop..
So yeah.. Thats all..

Do you like to argue with random people on your team? Do you want to learn how to speak simple yet essential Russian phrases? Do you like to dress up your guns with flashy yet useless skins? Of course you do, so hurry up get this game and either drop it after a week or play for an eternity.

The Classic CS source is a great game that many still play to this day 
If you are looking to play a calm chill game with no annoying kids or if cs is too hard for u cs source is a reliable option for new players because it is easier and u play with other players who are also experienced and the environment around you is family friendly unless u played for 500 or more hours and rage cuz u lost profit in csgo then yeah
i like the graphics, i think it looks way better then cs:go
best cs (at least better that cs:go)

Best Counter-Strike ever!!!
No skill group and just playing for fun. 
Many maps to choice and huge server list for every type of player.
Easy to use for server admins to administrate their own server, 
with very interesting and useful plugins.
